text: Ta dui ta lia zhong ta renwei jiang huojiu di na ren shuo:“Qing ni zai ni de zhuren mianqian tiqi wo [jiu wo chu yu].” Dan emo shi ta wangjile xiang ta de zhuren tiqi zhe jian shi [huo yi “dan emo shi ta wangjile zan nian ta de zhu (an la), yi qiu ta (an la) xiangzhu.”], Suoyi, ta zai yu zhong zuole ji nian lao.
